    • net.minecraft.block中Explosion的使用

      参数类型为Explosion的net.minecraft.block中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      boolean Block.canDropFromExplosion​(Explosion explosionIn)
      Return whether this block can drop from an explosion.
      boolean BlockTNT.canDropFromExplosion​(Explosion explosionIn)
      Return whether this block can drop from an explosion.
      float Block.getExplosionResistance​(World world, BlockPos pos, Entity exploder, Explosion explosion)
      Location sensitive version of getExplosionResistance
      void Block.onBlockExploded​(World world, BlockPos pos, Explosion explosion)
      Called when the block is destroyed by an explosion.
      void Block.onExplosionDestroy​(World worldIn, BlockPos pos, Explosion explosionIn)
      Called when this Block is destroyed by an Explosion
      void BlockStairs.onExplosionDestroy​(World worldIn, BlockPos pos, Explosion explosionIn)
      Called when this Block is destroyed by an Explosion
      void BlockTNT.onExplosionDestroy​(World worldIn, BlockPos pos, Explosion explosionIn)
      Called when this Block is destroyed by an Explosion

    • net.minecraft.world中Explosion的使用

      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
